channel.title: end of year on Gabe Kangas
channel.description: Recent content in end of year on Gabe Kangas

item.title: My 2018 in review
item.description: I figured enough has taken place this year, enough changes have taken place, and I’ve worked on enough projects that a post recapping things might be worthwhile. To start, here’s a playlist of my favorite songs of the year that you can listen to while reading this post. {=html} <iframe class="embedly-embed" src="//cdn.embedly.com/widgets/media.html?src=https%3A%2F%2Fopen.spotify.com%2Fembed%2Fuser%2Fgabek%2Fplaylist%2F19O9V2b18geBYuRWo17fqb&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fopen.spotify.com%2Fuser%2Fgabek%2Fplaylist%2F19O9V2b18geBYuRWo17fqb&amp;image=https%3A%2F%2Fmosaic.scdn.co%2F640%2F7f289e90ddb7bb04b51abcb0a0c8abc9e073d089997f86b60c8f790386efa16144af5e3ccc7c523be28ee5d01614983310f16f1f3746586affdf2f57ff72bd8dc442fbeeb681d09e36c4598982c578b8&amp;key=61d05c9d54e8455ea7a9677c366be814&amp;type=text%2Fhtml&amp;schema=spotify&amp;wmode=opaque" width="300" height="380" scrolling="no" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; fullscreen" allowfullscreen="true"> {=html} </iframe> So what did I do with this year?
